text: Yesli by nekiy chelovek, sovershivshiy prestupleniya [protiv religii], vladel vsemi bogatstvami zemnymi, to [v Sudnyy den'] on otdal by ikh za iskupleniye. Kogda zhe [predvoditeli mnogobozhnikov] uzryat nakazaniye, oni utayat [svoye] raskayaniye. Mezhdu [predstavshimi v Sudnyy den'] budet resheno po spravedlivosti, i nikto iz nikh ne budet obizhen
